00048 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00049 bool IOHandlerAccept::handle_event(struct kevent *event) {
00050   //DisplayEvent(event);
00051   if (event->filter == EVFILT_READ)
00052     return handle_incoming_connection();
00053   return true;
00054 }
00055 #elif defined(__linux__)
00056 bool IOHandlerAccept::handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00057   //DisplayEvent(event);
00058   return handle_incoming_connection();
00059 }
00060 #else
00061   ImplementMe;
00062 #endif

00066 bool IOHandlerAccept::handle_incoming_connection() {
00067   int sd;
00068   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00069   socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00070   int one = 1;
00071   IOHandlerData *data_handler;
00072 
00073   if ((sd = accept(m_sd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, &addr_len)) < 0) {
00074     HT_ERRORF("accept() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00075     return false;
00076   }
00077 
00078   HT_DEBUGF("Just accepted incoming connection, fd=%d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00079 
00080   // Set to non-blocking
00081   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00082 
00083 #if defined(__linux__)
00084   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00085     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00086 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00087   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00088     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00089 #endif
00090 
00091   int bufsize = 4*32768;
00092 
00093   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00094     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00095   }
00096   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00097     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00098   }
00099 
00100   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00101   m_handler_factory_ptr->get_instance(dhp);
00102 
00103   data_handler = new IOHandlerData(sd, addr, dhp);
00104 
00105   IOHandlerPtr handler(data_handler);
00106   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(data_handler);
00107   data_handler->start_polling();
00108 
00109   deliver_event(new Event(Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, data_handler->connection_id(), addr, Error::OK));
00110 
00111   return false;
00112  }
